name: quickbooks-parser
description: Parse QuickBooks CSV exports into canonical Spec-Kit format for reconciliation
author: Rowshni
capabilities: Extract account codes from parenthetical format: 'Accounts Payable (2000)'
Map QuickBooks column names to canonical Spec-Kit fields
Validate QuickBooks format and provide helpful error messages

input.csvContent: string - Raw CSV content from QuickBooks export

output.data: array - Parsed data in canonical Spec-Kit format
output.warnings: array - Any parsing warnings or issues detected

metadata.accountsExtracted: number - Count of accounts successfully parsed
metadata.formatConfidence: number - Confidence this is QuickBooks format (0-1)
